Posts.Content: Hi all, I was called in yesterday for a partial result of mammogram, scan and biopsy. My Dr said he is 95% sure I have cancer and will confirm next week, he thinks it is early stage and will remove some of my breast and lymph nodes to check if it's spread, the initial ultrasound didn't pick any up.  One minute I'm fine but next I have mini melt downs and of course all the bad stuff goes round in my head, what if it has spread, what if this is a secondary site ( I don't even know if that is possible ) , I'm hoping all this is normal.  How long from diagnosis is it usually until treatment is started?  I feel I have a million questions but don't know how or where to start xxx
Posts.Title: Told yesterday I have a 95% chance of Breast cancer, what happens...

Posts.Content: Thank you Lynn, it certainly helped just writing that post this morning and getting some of the feelings of frustration out, thank you for your support xxx
Posts.Title: Told yesterday I have a 95% chance of Breast cancer, what happens...

Posts.Content: Yep waiting and not knowing what happens next is the most frustrating thing xxx
Posts.Title: Told yesterday I have a 95% chance of Breast cancer, what happens...

Posts.Content: Thank you Jo you're spot on cos I don't feel ill at all it's just a dumb lump, but it's the waiting and not knowing yet what comes next, I'm usually so head on with things and very impatient to get things done xxx
Posts.Title: Told yesterday I have a 95% chance of Breast cancer, what happens...

Posts.Content: Thank you, I can't believe the amount of support I have received from you all already ❤ xxx
Posts.Title: Told yesterday I have a 95% chance of Breast cancer, what happens...
